snippet.title: Inherent Resolve (Launch Trailer) - Official DCS Campaign Out Now!
snippet.description:
Welcome to INHERENT RESOLVE
- A DCS Campaign for the F/A-18C + Syria map

Join the multinational coalition in the fight against Isis - the most ruthless and
violent terror organisation anywhere on earth 

Fly through 13 unique missions utilising a range of locations from across the map

Designed to get you into the cockpit of the mighty Hornet and flying immersive combat missions quickly and easily we think that you will love the player friendly approach to this campaign which features simple mission briefs, backed up by kneeboards and custom audio to guide you through your various tasks


Missions include:
✓ Fly reconnaissance sorties with RAF Tornado Gr4's
✓ Attack enemy airfields as part of a strike package
✓ Hunt High Value Targets with Task Force Zeus
✓ Battle for the Euphrates Dam
✓ Destroy key oil infrastructure sites
✓ Defend against vehicle borne improvised explosive devices
✓ Drop bridges with precision using laser guided bombs
✓ Attack oil convoys in the Syrian desert

Plus much more in this realistic and highly playable campaign


AVAILABLE NOW
https://www.digitalcombatsimulator.com/en/products/campaigns/fa-18c_inherent_resolve_campaign/


AVAILABLE NOW on STEAM
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2316470/DCS_FA18C_Inherent_Resolve_Campaign_by_Looking_Glass/


Looking Glass

Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/LookingGlassDCS

Discord
https://discord.com/channels/638064869714821139/772464335733129216


Thanks for watching
